sourcesContent:
<template>
  <Bar
    :chart-options="chartOptions"
    :chart-data="chartData"
    :chart-id="chartId"
    :dataset-id-key="datasetIdKey"
    :plugins="plugins"
    :css-classes="cssClasses"
    :styles="styles"
    :width="width"
    :height="height"
  />
</template>

<script>
import { BarChart } from "vue-chartjs/legacy";

export default {
  extends: Line,
  mounted() {
    this.renderChart(
      {
        labels: [
          "January",
          "February",
          "March",
          "April",
          "May",
          "June",
          "July"
        ],
        datasets: [
          {
            label: "Data 1",
            data: [2, 10, 5, 9, 0, 6, 20],
            backgroundColor: "transparent",
            borderColor: "rgba(1, 116, 188, 0.50)",
            pointBackgroundColor: "rgba(171, 71, 188, 1)"
          }
        ]
      },
      {
        responsive: true,
        maintainAspectRatio: false,
        title: {
          display: true,
          text: "My Data"
        }
      }
    );
  }
};
</script>
